# Message Link to Latest Tweet [(by slashie101)](https://www.twitch.tv/slashie101) 

## Import Code

```

```
To Set this up Change the FetchUrl to Include your Twitter name, and it will return an url to your last tweet. 

>This would be most effective set up as a `Timed Action` {.is-info}
